titles: An answer to the Bishop of Condom (now of Meaux) his Exposition of the Catholick faith, &c. wherein the doctrine of the Church of Rome is detected, and that of the Church of England expressed from the publick acts of both churches : to which are added reflections on his pastoral letter.
author: Gilbert, John, b. 1658 or 9.
publisher: Printed by H.C. for R. Kettlewel and R. Wells ...,
notes: Written by John Gilbert, vicar of St. John the Baptist's Church in Peterborough.  He is sometimes confused with an older John Gilbert, canon of Exeter.  Cf. DNB; Jones, T. Catalogue of the collection of tracts for and against popery (published in or about the reign of James II) in the Manchester library founded by Humphrey Chetham, v. 1, p. 114.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: Bossuet, Jacques Bénigne, 1627-1704. --  Exposition de la doctrine de l'Eglise catholique sur les matières de controverse.
